misinformation: The Earth is flat and NASA has been covering this up for decades.
Vaccines cause autism and are part of a global conspiracy.
The moon landing was faked in a Hollywood studio in 1969.
Climate change is a hoax perpetrated by scientists for funding.
5G networks cause COVID-19 and brain cancer.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space with the naked eye.
Humans only use 10% of their brain capacity.
Sharks don't get cancer, so eating shark cartilage can cure it.
The pyramids were built by aliens, not ancient Egyptians.
Drinking 8 glasses of water per day is scientifically proven to be necessary.
